# Dazzled
## Overview
The creature is unable to see well because of overstimulation of the eyes. A dazzled creature takes a â€“1 penalty on attack rolls and sight-based [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] checks.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg 566
